name: Pastel Putter
description:
Pastel Putter is a simple mini golf game demo with a cel-shading inspired feel.

Putt your way through short little mini golf courses with the relaxing soundtrack in the background. Whether you want a casual game to play in long game queues, or simply want a relaxing way to pass the time Pastel Putter's chill vibe is perfect for you.



Click and drag to line up your shot, then release to send the ball flying.
Don't launch it too hard or you might go flying off the edge!!!



Play a single hole or a few dozen, easily jump in and out to of the game

created by a one person team with love!!
